Method Detail

isUpper

public static boolean isUpper(String s)
Checks if a String is all upper case

Parameters:
s - the String to check
Returns:
boolean for if the String is all upper case

scrambleOrRemove

public static void scrambleOrRemove(List<String> wordList)
Modifies wordList by replacing each word with its scrambled version, removing any words that are unchanged as a result of scrambling.

Parameters:
wordList - the list of words Precondition: wordList contains only non-null objects Postcondition: - all words unchanged by scrambling have been removed from wordList - each of the remaining words has been replaced by its scrambled version - the relative ordering of the entries in wordList is the same as it was before the method was called

scrambleWord

public static String scrambleWord(String word)
Scrambles a given word.

Parameters:
word - the word to be scrambled
Returns:
the scrambled word (possibly equal to word) Precondition: word is either an empty string or contains only uppercase letters. Postcondition: the string returned was created from word as follows: - the word was scrambled, beginning at the first letter and continuing from left to right - two consecutive letters consisting of "A" followed by a letter that was not "A" were swapped - letters were swapped at most once

scrambleWord

public static String scrambleWord(String word,
                                  String matched)
Scrambles a given word.

Parameters:
word - the word to be scrambled
matched - one letter word to be matched
Returns:
the scrambled word (possibly equal to word) Precondition: word is either an empty string or contains only uppercase letters. Postcondition: the string returned was created from word as follows: - the word was scrambled, beginning at the first letter and continuing from left to right - two consecutive letters consisting of Matched followed by a letter that was not Matched were swapped - letters were swapped at most once
